text: There'll be ups and downs, smiles and frowns.
author: Snoop Dogg

text: Hurt me with the truth, don't comfort me with a lie.
author: Rihanna

text: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

text: I wanna thank me for believing in me, I wanna thank me for doing all this hard work, I wanna thank me for having no days off...
author: Snoop Dogg
